title: Textile, 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: counted running stitch on plain weave foundation
creditline: Gift of Provident Securities Company from the Estate of Mr. and Mrs. William H. Crocker
description: A very stylized tree form, with sawtooth-edged braches springing diagonally in from a central trunk to form a chevron. The branches are decorated with voided squares and tiny crosses. Embroidered in red, tan, and white silks on a blue linen ground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 18th century.
18th century. Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: counted running stitch on plain weave foundation. Gift of Provident Securities Company from the Estate of Mr. and Mrs. William H. Crocker. 1955-133-1.
